data.Definitions_15: Definitions: • A household is defined as a group of people who routinely eat out of same pot and live on the same compound (or physical location). It is possible that they may live in different structures. Sharing the pot is the unifying factor for households. • Definition of HH head: is member of the family who manages the family resources and decisions (He/she is the final decision maker on most of the decision related to income allocation and major family activities).
data.q27_28: When did the members of your HH arrive from Syria? (number of months)
data.text_42: Consider only meals consumed at home or in public kitchen but not in private restautrants or street food. DO NOT count food consumed in very small amounts; ie less than a teaspoon per person or consumed by only one member of HH (list below to be adjusted to context)
data.q32_43: CONSUMPTION PATTERN Over the last 7 days, how many days did you consume the following foods? ( 0 = Not eaten, 1 = 1 day, 2 = 2 days, 3 = 3 days, 4 = 4 days, 5 = 5 days, 6 = 6 days, 7 = Everyday
data.q33_57: FOOD SOURCES What was the main source of the food in the past 7 days? (0= Not consumed, 1 = Own production, 2 = Bought with cash, 3 = Bought on credit, 4 = Exchanged/borrowed, 5 = Received as gift, 6 =WFP food assistance, 7 = Non WFP official food assistance, 8= Hunting/gathering/fishing)
data.q41_72: During the last 7 days, how many times (in days) did your household had to employ one of the following strategies to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it? 0 = Not applied, 1 = 1 day, 2 = 2 days, 3 = 3 days, 4 = 4 days, 5 = 5 days, 6 = 6 days, 7 = Everyday
data.q42_80: In the past 30 days, has your household applied any of the below strategies to meet basic food needs? 0 = No, 1 = Yes, 2 = No, because I have exhausted this strategy already and cannot do it anymore
data.q51_89: For the past month, what are the 3 main sources of cash/income to sustain your household? (Use the codes below)
data.q52_97: What are the Household's 3 main needs at this moment; in order of importance (Use the codes below)
data.q62_108: Is the food e-voucher programme and its key components clearly understood by the HH?; (Yes = 1, No = 0)
data.q66_120: Have you heard of any of the following problems concerning WFP assistance over this past cycle?
data.q68_130: If you exchanged/sold their food/voucher, which needs did they need to cover: 3 main needs in order of importance (Use the codes below)
data.q76_143: Why do you go to this shop? (answer Yes = 1, No = 0 to the following options)
data.q77_152: Did you face any of the following problems while redeeming the e-vouchers in the shop? (Yes = 1, No = 0)
data.q82_168: What type of foods did you exchange most of your e-voucher for (list 3 most important food groups in order of quantity exchanged)
data.q93_225: Yesterday, during the day or night, did the child eat or drink any of the following food items? (Yes = 1, No = 0)
